text: Brad Pitt will be allowed to spend more time with his kids after a judge set up a new custody arrangement between the actor and his ex, Angelina Jolie. However, it doesn ’ t mean the “ Fury ” star considers the latest ruling a major victory over his estranged wife. Despite a recent report, Pitt, who shares Pax, 14, Zahara, 13, Shiloh, 12, and twins Vivienne and Knox, 9, with Jolie, has not been partying alongside famous pals like Jennifer Aniston and George Clooney amid his ongoing custody battle.
